Translations.Text: ql -ayha alrswl-: hu allah almtfrd balalwhyt walrbwbyt walasma' walsfat, la ysharkh ahd fyha
allh wahdah almaqsud fi qada' alhwayj walrghayb
lys lah walad wala walid wala sahbt
walam yakun lah mumathilaan wala mshabhana 'ahad min khalqihi, la fi 'asmayih wala fi safatihi, wala fi 'afealihi, tabarak wataealaa wtqddas
ql -ayha alrasul-: 'aeudh wa'aetasim birabi alfaliq, wahu alsbh
wimin shara layl shadid alzalmat 'iidha dakhal wataghlghul, wama fih min alshurur walmudhiat
wmin shari alssahirat allaati ynfkhn fima yaeqadun min euqad biqasd alsihar
wimin sharin hasid mubaghad lilnaas 'iidha hasadahum ealaa ma wahabahum allah min nem, wa'arad zawalaha eanhum, wa'iiqae al'adhaa bihm
ql -ayha alrrsul-: 'aeudh wa'aetasim birabi alnnas, alqadir wahdah ealaa rdd shari alwaswas
milik alnaas almutasarif fi kl shuuwnihim, alghny eanhm
'iilh alnaas aldhy la maebud bihaqin suah
min 'adhana alshaytan aladhi yuaswis eind alghuflat, wayakhtafi eind dhakar allh
aldhy ybthth alshara walshukuk fi sudur alnnas
